application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 5 (submission of details - b) Notwithstanding the approved drawings, any new applied hard flooring(including underfloor heating). The details should include samples and on all floors above lower ground floor level should include a section at 1:10 showing relationship to retained skirtings and existing flooring. All surviving historic floorboards/flooring should be retained) of planning permission PP/23/00047 (Reconstruct roof as mansard, with flat centre; lead covered dormers with box sash windows; Including 1 low profile rooflights and 1No lantern; concealed bike/bin storage area; reconstruction of rear conservatory extension  at raised ground floor level; raise parapet of rear closet wing and install 1 No low profile rooflight; renewal of and modifications to railings to rear garden; other modifications to fenestration including replacement french doors to LGF rear bedroom suite and reinstatement of a fixed door to LGF closet wing extension; alterations to internal partitions)
site_name: 3 Neville Terrace, Onslow Gardens, LONDON, SW7 3AT
